amendment.description: To promote transparency by requiring the establishment of an online interactive map displaying the locations of broadband deployment projects that are funded by the Federal Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2164 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 306.

action.text: Amendment SA 2164 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5819, S5820; text: CR S5819) To promote transparency by requiring the establishment of an online interactive map displaying the locations of broadband deployment projects that are funded by the Federal Government.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2164 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 2137.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2164 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 306.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2164 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 306.
